00024 #warning "WARNING: I must to disable some function with this version of openssl... be aware"

00026 #       define HMAC_CTX_init(ctx)
00027 #       define HMAC_Init_ex(ctx,key,len,md,impl)
00028 
00029 #       define EVP_MD_CTX_init(ctx)
00030 #       define EVP_SignInit_ex(a,b,c)
00031 #       define EVP_MD_CTX_cleanup(ctx)
00032 #       define EVP_VerifyInit_ex(a,b,c)

00037 #define U_MAX_HASH_SIZE                 256 /* Max size of any expected hash algorithms (oversized) */
00038 #define U_MAX_HASH_BLOCK_SIZE    64 /* Max size of blocks used - MD5 and SHA1 are both 64 bytes */

00063 extern U_EXPORT UHashType               u_hashType;                                                     /* What type of hash is this? */
00064 extern U_EXPORT EVP_PKEY*     u_pkey;                       /* private key to sign the digest */
00065 extern U_EXPORT EVP_MD_CTX              u_mdctx;                                                                /* Context for digest */
00066 extern U_EXPORT const EVP_MD* u_md;                                                                     /* Digest instance */
00067 extern U_EXPORT unsigned char   u_mdValue[U_MAX_HASH_SIZE];     /* Final output */
00068 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t                u_mdLen;                                                                /* Length of digest */
00069 
00070 extern U_EXPORT HMAC_CTX      u_hctx;                                                           /* Context for HMAC */
00071 extern U_EXPORT const char*     u_hmac_key;                                                     /* The loaded key */
00072 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t      u_hmac_keylen;                                            /* The loaded key length */
00073 
00074 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_algoritm(int alg);
00075 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_hexdump(unsigned char* buf);

00091 static inline void u_dgst_hash(unsigned char* data, uint32_t length)
00092 {
00093         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("u_dgst_hash(%.*s,%u)", length, data, length)
00094 
00095         if (u_hmac_keylen)
00096                 {
00097                 HMAC_Update(&u_hctx, data, length);
00098                 }
00099         else
00100                 {
00101                 (void) EVP_DigestUpdate(&u_mdctx, data, length);
00102                 }
00103 }
00104 
00116 extern U_EXPORT uint32_t u_dgst_finish(unsigned char* hash, int base64); /* Finish and get hash */
00117 
00118 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_reset(void); /* Reset the hash */

00120 /* The EVP signature routines are a high level interface to digital signatures
00121  */
00122 
00123 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_sign_init(int alg, ENGINE* impl);
00124 extern U_EXPORT void u_dgst_verify_init(int alg, ENGINE* impl);
00125 
00126 static inline void u_dgst_sign_hash(unsigned char* data, uint32_t length)
00127 {
00128         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("u_dgst_sign_hash(%.*s,%u)", length, data, length)
00129 
00130         (void) EVP_SignUpdate(&u_mdctx, data, length);
00131 }
00132 
00133 static inline void u_dgst_verify_hash(unsigned char* data, uint32_t length)
00134 {
00135         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("u_dgst_verify_hash(%.*s,%u)", length, data, length)
00136 
00137         (void) EVP_SignUpdate(&u_mdctx, data, length);
00138 }

00140 uint32_t u_dgst_sign_finish(unsigned char* sig, int base64); /* Finish and get signature */
00141 int             u_dgst_verify_finish(unsigned char* sigbuf, uint32_t siglen);
